snippet: The two former presidents exchanged compliments in Washington on Monday as part of an initiative involving four presidential libraries.
abstract: Former presidents Bill Clinton and George W Bush introduce joint program called Presidential Leadership Scholars, which aims to train young leaders through a collaboration of their presidential libraries and those of the elder George Bush and Lyndon B Johnson; program will inaugurate its first class in February 2015.
lead_paragraph: The two former presidents exchanged compliments in Washington on Monday as part of an initiative involving four presidential libraries.

headline.main: Laughs and Accolades as Clinton and Bush Introduce a Leadership Program
headline.print_headline: Laughs and Accolades as Clinton and Bush Introduce a Leadership Program
